A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I have no idea how there can be such a large gap between the critics and fans scores. Are the russians involved?\nOr is the mouse paying them off. Quite hard to elaborate without spoilers but good luck with a Rian trilogy. How they feel that he has earnt that after this dribble is beyond comprehension. The marvel-esque jokes were a total cringe and the timing of them was poor. Certain characters were made to be a complete waste of time. In a 2 and a half hr film about 25 minutes was relevant. The rest was a cgi quip fest that lacked any substance at all. At times it felt like a star wars parody. How long will it be before disney demands a porgs film? I rate it at the bottom between clones and menace. Added nothing to the saga at all.
